footer.text: Character Guide • Synergy: Sayu | Update Date: 10/06/2022 | Editor: Samantha#9907

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
The last team is generally for overworld exploration mainly. Sayu's roll's duration can be used to take players from the start of a domain to where rewards are claimed. 
Note that Sayu's roll (Elemental Skill) __does not__ trigger things such as Yelan/Xingqiu's Elemental Bursts or Beidou's Elemental Burst.
